game_description: Learning Life - Mysteeri 24/7 is an immersive escape game for vocational rehabilitation and youth work. Learning Life is a single-player game with linear gameplay with varying tasks and puzzles. In Learning Life – Mysteeri 24/7 the player adapts a role of a youth facing everyday challenges. Game is presented in first-person view and players are tasked to solve different issues and problems. The game has three levels: finding and moving to a new home, applying for a job or a place of study, and managing the chaos of everyday life. The game was created in cooperation with Kajaani University of Applied Sciences, Laurea University of Applied Sciences and Häme University of Applied Sciences. Development was funded by Kela.
